titleStmt.title: A balbale to Enki for I&c;me-Dagan (I&c;me-Dagan E) -- an English prose translation

publicationStmt.distributor: The Electronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature

address.addrLine: The Oriental Institute, University of Oxford, Pusey Lane, Oxford OX1 2LE, UK, email etcsl@orinst.ox.ac.uk, http://etcsl.orinst.ox.ac.uk

seriesStmt.p: The Electronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature aims to make accessible over 400 literary works composed in the Sumerian language in ancient Mesopotamia during the late third and early second millennia BC. The works are in Sumerian composite transliteration and English prose translation with bibliographical information on each composition.

sourceDesc.p: Sources are listed in the header of the composite text

lg.p:
&X;&X; in the holy heart &X;&X;, &X;&X;, whose words are powerful, who &X;&X; decisions. &X;&X; foremost of the gods, omniscient &X;&X;. &X;&X; Enki, counsellor of holy An, adviser of the Great Mountain &X;&X;. &X;&X; foremost of the gods, omniscient &X;&X;. &X;&X; Enki, counsellor of holy An, adviser of the Great Mountain &X;&X;. Adviser, whose statements cannot be countermanded, whose ways &X;&X; fearsomeness. Patient-hearted, who rides upon all the divine powers, who &X;&X; like Enlil. Nudimmud &X;&X; holy dais &X;&X;. Lord imbued with fearsomeness, borne by An and Ura&c;, eldest brother of &X;&X;. King whose ways are recognised by Enlil, caretaker of &X;&X;. Supreme &X;&X;, first-born child of holy An, whose divine powers are untouchable &X;&X;. Junior Enlil of trustworthy utterances, &X;&X; divine plans. Nudimmud, lord who determines the fates, who strengthens the Land &X;&X;. Enki, great bull of Eridug, &X;&X;. &X;&X; greatly exalted among the Anuna &X;&X;.
&X;&X; like sheep (?) &X;&X;.

lg.note: The sequence of Segments B and C is uncertain, and they may well belong to a different composition
lg.p:
I&c;me-Dagan &X;&X;.
&X;&X; the house (?) of Enlil &X;&X;. &X;&X; of Enlil &X;&X; his statements &X;&X;. &X;&X; counsellor of holy An &X;&X;.

lg.note: The sequence of Segments B and C is uncertain, and they may well belong to a different composition
lg.p: Nudimmud &X;&X;. Lord of Eridug &X;&X;. I&c;me-Dagan &X;&X;, son of Enlil &X;&X;. &X;&X; gives (?) you your instructions &X;&X;. Wise &X;&X;. &X;&X; divine plans &X;&X;. Omniscient &X;&X;.

&X;&X; excellent divine powers &X;&X;
May he prepare for you &X;&X; liquor and emmer beer &X;&X; at the royal offering-place and salute you from there. &X;&X; prays to you (?) &X;&X;.
May he bestow a long life with vigorous (?) days on I&c;me-Dagan, the son of Enlil! May Father Enki bestow a long life with vigorous (?) days on I&c;me-Dagan, the son of Enlil!

trailer.p: A balbale of Enki. lines 8 and 9 are written as one line in source
